title: Stirling
name: Bannockburn
content: The battlefield is the site of another major victory for the Scots over the English in 1314. The ''Bannockburn Heritage Centre'' has closed and a new centre will open in 2014. In 2013 there is a temporary exhibition, but there is also building and restoration work on the site. A path leads to a statue of Robert the Bruce, King of Scotland, who led the Scottish forces. From the statue you have a great overview of the landscape
